remarks: Closure of vector addition in a subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lssvacl.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lssvacl.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lssvacl $p |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) /\ ( X e. U /\ Y e. U ) ) -> ( X .+ Y ) e. U ) $.
